metadata.title: What We Know About the Conflict Between Faction X and Faction Y
metadata.description: After Faction Y's surprise attack on Faction X on Oct. 7, Faction X has been besieging and bombarding Region Z, worsening a humanitarian crisis.
metadata.author: Ephrat Livni and Gaya Gupta

quiz.question: When did Faction Y launch its surprise attack on Faction X?
How many people were killed in the Faction Y attack according to Gov X?

events.text: After Faction Y's surprise attack on Faction X on Oct. 7, Faction X has been besieging and bombarding Region Z, worsening a humanitarian crisis.
events.short_text: Faction X besieging and bombarding Region Z after Faction Y attack

events.text: On Oct. 7, Faction Y led a surprise attack on towns, a music festival, army bases and other locations in Faction X, killing roughly 1,200 people and taking about 240 hostages, including children, according to Gov X.
events.short_text: Faction Y attacks Gov X towns, a music festival, and military bases

events.text: Gov X officials vowed to destroy Faction Y, the group that controls Region Z and is considered a terrorist organization by several international bodies.
events.short_text: Gov X officials vow to destroy Faction Y

events.text: Faction X has since besieged Region Z in one of the most intense bombing campaigns of this century and launched a ground invasion.
events.short_text: Faction X launches a ground invasion of Region Z

events.text: More than 11,000 people in Region Z, including more than 4,600 children, have been killed since Gov X's campaign began, according to Region Z's health ministry.
events.short_text: Over 11,000 killed in Region Z, including 4,600 children
